review: First I have a DVD player with the features that the Fire TV stick has except one and that is an App for the Amazon Music Library. I seem to have amassed a lot of music in the Library which I can  play on my cell or computer, or Download and copy to a USB and plug that into my DVD player to play through my sound system. Now I just switch to the Stick and play away.There are several things about the Fire Stick that I an not crazy about but if you don't have a 'Smart' TV or DVD player this will hook you up. But you will need Wi-Fi installed in your home. But  It certainly is worth the price and it's easy to hook up. One warning It hooks up to your TV with an HDMI cable, my TV only has two inputs so I had to pick up a small gadget that you attach to multiply your inputs.  Also you'll need a place to plug it in. The back of my TV looks like a jumble of snakes. And you have another remote to keep track of.
